p: Comment 10: The authors may add the recent relevant reference, Ryua DH, JY Cho, NB Sadiq, JC Kim, BY Lee, M Hamayun et al. (2020) Optimization of antioxidant, anti-diabetic, and anti-inflammatory activities and ganoderic acid content of differentially dried Ganoderma lucidum using response surface methodology. Food Chemistry, 335: 127645
